      • addToken

        protected void addToken​(javafx.scene.Scene scene)
        adds a random taken to gameplay. Ramdom integer generated recurrently to determine the token to be spawned.
        Parameters:
        scene - Provides scene to which token needs to be added. It is the game play scene.

      • getToken

        protected BallTokens getToken​(int a)
        Generates a new token based on a randomly generated integer (range 0 to 4; one for each of the 5 tokens)
        Parameters:
        a - Randomly generated integer which chooses the token to be instantiated.
        Returns:
        Token object that has to be spawned.
